name: Reality is what happens (not what we write)
description: What has happened on projects I have observed or participated. A talk about verified behaviour emerging from community-based games and the implications of blockchain to catalyze them.

speakers.name: Rafael Morado
speakers.bio: Raf works at Lattice. He has been doing blockchain consumer applications since 2017. Before that he was making games. Previous companies: Dapper Labs, CCP and Ubisoft.
